message: I propose we divide the money with a ratio of 3:1. This ensures a fair distribution considering the risk of inflation.
I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  While I understand your initial proposal, I think a more even split is a better starting point for us. We both have a lot to gain if we work together.
I suggest an equal split, as it reflects fairness and cooperation. This might encourage better outcomes in future rounds.
